DOC.brief_summary: Do specific verbal tactile cue instruction help people perform bridge exercise improve hip muscle strength optimize recruitment gluteus maximus muscle ?
DOC.criteria: female 1840 year age normal muscle strength low extremity evidence patellofemoral pain syndrome evidence femoracetabular impingement evidence mechanical low back pain causing radicular ( low extremity ) symptoms history previous hip knee ligament injury history low extremity trauma history low extremity surgery history neurological condition impair motor function current low extremity pain limit functional activity
